name: FloppaFlip
description:
FloppaFlip

Help Floppa the caracal avoid Four types of enemies: Pop cat, Dora, Amogus, Thomas Young!

What will you face in that strange world of Floppa's Tkinter canvas? Now you can spend ten minutes of your day to collect ten pop-its with Floppa! 

This game includes mystery story about cycles, danger landscape, continuous surviving and of course music belonging to Toby Fox and Scott Cawthon, all you like!

Download folder below on your English or Russian language, install last Python and play and delete that after twenty minutes! Have a good time!

FloppaFlip works Only with FHD+ displays!

It is normal if the game works incorrect way or leave open windows after game session - keep restarting and closing unneeded windows until everything is good

FloppaFlip is a short ridiculous game written in python with included py-libraries.

antikiwi 2023 - all rights didn't reserve
